member.name: T:AdcsToRest.ActiveDirectory
member.summary: A class holding methods that help acquiring PKI related information from Active Directory.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.ActiveDirectory.GetCertificateAuthority(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a certification authority and the templates bound to it from Active Directory.
member.param: The name of the target certificate authority.
Causes returned certificates to contain headers and line breaks.
member.exception: Throws a HTTP 404 error if the specified certificate authority was not found in Active Directory.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.ActiveDirectory.GetCertificateAuthorityCollection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all certificate authorities in the Active Directory forest, and the templates bound to each.
member.param: Causes returned certificates to contain headers and line breaks.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.ActiveDirectory.GetConfigString(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the configuration string for a certificate authority.
member.param: The name of the target certificate authority.
member.returns: The configuration string, built from the CA's DNS name and the CA common name.
member.exception: Throws a HTTP 404 error if the specified certificate authority was not found in Active Directory.

member.name: T:AdcsToRest.CCertRequestExtensions
member.summary: A class that extends the functionality if ICertRequest for the needs of our API.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CCertRequestExtensions.RetrievePending(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a certificate from a certificate authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certificate authority.
Specifies if the certificate shall be returned as a PKCS#7 container that includes the entire certificate chain.
Causes returned certificates to contain headers and line breaks.
member.exception: Throws a HTTP 500 error if not successful.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CCertRequestExtensions.Submit(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Submits a certificate request to a certificate authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certificate authority.
The certificate request as BASE64 without headers.
An optional list of request attributes that shall be passed to the certificate authority.
Submission flags.
Specifies if the certificate shall be returned as a PKCS#7 container that includes the entire certificate chain.
Causes returned certificates to contain headers and line breaks.
member.exception: Throws a HTTP 500 error if not successful.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CCertRequestExtensions.GetCrlDpCollection(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves certificate revocation list distribution point information from a certificate authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certificate authority.
Causes returned certificates to contain headers and line breaks.
member.exception: Throws a HTTP 500 error if not successful.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CCertRequestExtensions.GetAiaCollection(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves authority information access information from a certificate authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certificate authority.
Causes returned certificates to contain headers and line breaks.
member.exception: Throws a HTTP 500 error if not successful.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CCertRequestExtensions.GetCaCertificate(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a CA or CA exchange certificate from a certificate authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certificate authority.
Specifies if the certificate shall be returned as a PKCS#7 container that includes the entire certificate chain.
Returns the CA exchange certificate instead of the CA certificate.
Causes returned certificates to contain headers and line breaks.
member.exception: Throws a HTTP 500 error if not successful.

member.name: T:AdcsToRest.CertificateRequestIntegrityChecks
member.summary: A class that helps identifying the type of the certificate request and harmonizing it for further processing.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CertificateRequestIntegrityChecks.VerifyCertificateRequest(System.String,System.Int32,System.String@)
member.summary: Verifies if the certificate request can be parsed as defined by the requestType.
member.param: The certificate request in BASE64 format, with or without headers.
The request type specifies how the certificate request is to be interpreted.
Harmonized certificate request, returned as BASE64 without header, regardless of the given input.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CertificateRequestIntegrityChecks.DetectRequestType(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Identifies the type of a given certificate request.
member.param: The input certificate request as BASE64 encoded string (aka PEM), with headers or without.
The input certificate request as BASE64 encoded string (aka PEM) without headers.
member.returns: The request type to be used with ICertRequest::Submit

member.name: T:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthoritiesController
member.summary: An API controller for all operations related to a certificate authority.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthoritiesController.GetAllCas(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of all available certificate authorities.
member.param: Causes returned certificates to contain headers and line breaks.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthoritiesController.GetCaByName(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves details for a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.
Causes returned certificates to contain headers and line breaks.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthoritiesController.GetCaCertificate(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the current certificate authority certificate for a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.
When set to true, the Certificate response property will be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain instead of a plain certificate.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthoritiesController.GetCaExchangeCertificate(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the current certificate authority exchange certificate for a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.
When set to true, the Certificate response property will be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain instead of a plain certificate.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthoritiesController.GetCrlDp(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of certificate revocation list distribution points for a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthoritiesController.GetAia(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of authority information access distribution points for a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificatesController.GetCertificateByRequestId(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves an issued certificate from a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.
The request ID of the certificate to retrieve.
Causes the response to be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain.
Causes returned certificates to contain headers and line breaks.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificatesController.SubmitCertificateRequest(System.String,AdcsToRest.Models.CertificateRequest,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Submits a certificate signing request to a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.
The data structure containing the certificate request and optional settings.
The certificate template the certificate request shall be assigned to.
Causes the response to be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain.
Causes returned certificates to contain headers and line breaks.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateTemplatesController.GetCertificateTemplateCollection
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all certificate templates in the underlying Active Directory environment.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateTemplatesController.GetCertificateTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves details for a certificate template.
member.param: The name of the target certificate template.

member.name: T:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_INVALID_CSR
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to parse the given certificate request..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_MISSING_CA
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate authority {0} was not found..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_MISSING_PARAMETER
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The {0} parameter is missing or invalid..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_MISSING_TEMPLATE
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate template {0} was not found..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_SUBMISSION_FAILED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to connect to certificate authority because {0}..

member.name: T:AdcsToRest.Models.AuthorityInformationAccess
member.summary: A data structure containing authority information access for a certificate authority.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.AuthorityInformationAccess.Urls
member.summary: A collection of authority information access urls that are available for the certification authority certificate.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.AuthorityInformationAccess.OcspUrls
member.summary: A collection of online certificate status protocol urls that are available for the certification authority certificate.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.AuthorityInformationAccess.Certificate
member.summary: The X.509 V3 certification authority certificate. Always returned as BASE64-encoded DER with header (also known as PEM).

member.summary: A data structure holding information about a certificate authority.

member.summary: Builds the object from a SearchResult containing a pKIEnrollmentService LDAP object.

member.summary: The common name of the certificate authority.

member.summary: A list of all certificate templates offered by the certificate authority.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.CertificateAuthority.Certificate
member.summary: The current certificate authority certificate of the certificate authority.

member.summary: A collection of CertificateAuthority Objects.

member.summary: A collection of CertificateAuthority Objects.

member.summary: A data structure containing a certificate request and a list of optional request attributes.

member.summary: The X.509 certificate signing request as BASE64 encoded DER. Request types are detected automatically.

member.summary: Optional request attributes as a collection of strings.

member.summary: A data structure containing certificate revocation list distribution point information for a certificate authority.

member.summary: A collection of uniform resource locators the certificate revocation list is distributed by the certificate authority.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.CertificateRevocationListDistributionPoint.Crl
member.summary: The X.509 V2 certificate revocation list. Always returned as BASE64-encoded DER with header (also known as PEM).
